title: Himi 77
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Eiki ke ke fakafo’ou
‘A hoku mālohi,
He koe loto vaivai au
Mo e tu’utamaki.
2.
’Oku ou feinga ke u ma’u
‘A e angatonu,
Mo e mālohi ‘i loto
‘I he fakafo’ou.
3.
Pea u lava atu,’Eiki
Ki he ‘Afiona,
‘I he tui ‘o e loto
Pea u fai ma’u ai pē.
4.
Pea ‘i he’eku tui
Peau tonuhia,
Pea u ma’u ‘a e melino
Mo hoku ‘Otua.
5.
’Eiki ko e ngāue ‘a ‘au
Ke fakafo’ou au,
Pea u tukuange ni au
Ki he ‘Afiona.
6.
’E ‘ikai te u kei faaki
Ki he’eku ngāue,
Ka ki he ngāue ‘a ‘au
Ko e fakalelei.
7.
‘Oku ke tu’u ‘i he vaha’a
‘O e Tamai mo au
Ko hoku fakalaloa,
‘I he’eku hia. *
